headline: Progressive (PGR) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: What Progressive’s Recent Returns Might Signal for Investors With no single headline event driving attention, Progressive (PGR) is drawing interest as investors reassess the stock after a recent 9.5% decline over the past month and 6% drop over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Progressive. At a share price of $206.03, Progressive’s 30 day share price return of a 9.5% decline and year to date share price return of a 2.87% decline sit against a 1 year total shareholder return of...
